scripts.install-webpack: npm install --save-dev webpack webpack-cli && npm install --save-dev html-webpack-plugin style-loader css-loader html-loader && npm install --save-dev webpack-dev-server
scripts.pre-deploy: git checkout gh-pages && git merge main --no-edit && npx webpack
scripts.deploy: git add dist -f && git commit -m 'Deployment commit' && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages && git checkout main
